entities.name: ron
entities.description: Ron is described as a person who is laughing and making a comment about Harry's date.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is the main character of the story and is described as being unnerved by the prospect of dancing with his date.

entities.name: hermione
entities.description: Hermione is mentioned as someone who has made a comment about Krum, implying that she may not think he's attractive.

entities.name: krum
entities.description: Krum is a famous wizard and the date of Hermione. He is described as being liked by girls only because of his fame.

entities.name: cho
entities.description: Cho is mentioned as someone who has asked Harry to be her partner for the ball. Harry wonders if she would still want to go with him if he wasn't a school champion.

relationships.description: Harry is considering Cho as a potential partner for the ball, but wonders if she would still want to go with him if he wasn't a school champion.
Harry compares himself to Krum, wondering if Cho would still want to go with him if he wasn't famous like Krum.
